metadata.physical_appearance: "The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a man. He is looking in the direction where the photograph was captured. He is dressed in a uniform, which consists of a beret, a long sleeved shirt, shorts, and a belt. The number ""8452"" is displayed on his uniform just beside his left shoulder. There is a military vehicle on the right hand side of the photograph
